item.title: EP 886 - Do Demons Understand What Magick Is?
item.itunes:title: Do Demons Understand What Magick Is?
item.description:
Today we meet a boy who is not from around here, and then we look at Solomon’s Shamir and ask the question: Do demons believe in magick?!?
